.sprite {
    background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    display: block;
}

.sprite-enter-icon {
    width: 18px;
    height: 16px;
    background-position: -10px -10px;
}

.sprite-fb-icon {
    width: 12px;
    height: 22px;
    background-position: -48px -10px;
}

.sprite-fb-icon_hover {
    width: 12px;
    height: 22px;
    background-position: -80px -10px;
}

.sprite-inst-icon {
    width: 20px;
    height: 21px;
    background-position: -10px -52px;
}

.sprite-inst-icon_hover {
    width: 20px;
    height: 21px;
    background-position: -50px -52px;
}

.sprite-lock-icon {
    width: 15px;
    height: 17px;
    background-position: -90px -52px;
}

.sprite-user-icon {
    width: 15px;
    height: 15px;
    background-position: -90px -89px;
}

.sprite-vk-icon {
    width: 25px;
    height: 16px;
    background-position: -112px -10px;
}

.sprite-vk-icon_hover {
    width: 25px;
    height: 16px;
    background-position: -125px -46px;
}
